name: PopupMenuItem
desc: An item in a Material Design popup menu.

fields.name: value
fields.desc: The value that will be returned by [showMenu] if this entry is selected.

fields.name: onTap
fields.desc: Called when the menu item is tapped.

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: Whether the user is permitted to select this item.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The minimum height of the menu item.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The padding of the menu item.

fields.name: textStyle
fields.desc: The text style of the popup menu item.

fields.name: labelTextStyle
fields.desc: The label style of the popup menu item.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.popupmenu.mouseCursor} The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.
